data.title: Film Music – Brett Mitchell
data.text:
FILM MUSIC

Brett Mitchell performs his original solo piano arrangements of iconic cues from film score history.

Cues marked with an asterisk (*) are presented in synchronization with the original, corresponding film clips.

Films are listed in chronological order by release date.

For Mr. Mitchell’s performances of the works of John Williams, please visit Brett Mitchell Plays John Williams.
